main event: Local civilians observed three objects in the sky making sharp right angle turns and climbing erratic flight patterns at approximately 1945.
interesting points: The objects were initially thought to be jet aircraft but their speed and maneuvers were unusual., The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes., Another sighting occurred on March 22, 1962, where three circular silver objects were observed moving at a high rate of speed., The objects in the second sighting appeared to glide silently and disappeared after 10-15 seconds., The reports were documented in Project Blue Book and included observations from civilian witnesses.
witness description: local civilians and a civilian from Washington Street, Hyde Park
